resources.string: This app requires full disk access, so that the image files can be moved between the selected folders. Android does not grant file movement without it.
Please click here to open the Android settings to give permission

&explanation; 

To get started: 
1. Click on the two paths below to select two directories from where and to where you want to move your images 
2. Swipe your images left and right to move them respectively 
3. Enjoy
